title: I heard that there was lore saying Trynd and Ashe were married?
body: I checked their lore and it never said anything about it, so is it a lie or is it one of those extra lore stories?

replies.body: from Ashe's OLD lore "Rumors abound that Ashe has begun to associate herself with fellow champion Tryndamere outside of the Fields of Justice. While she denies such talk as frivolous, all eyes will remain on Ashe now that her success in the League may finally allow her to restore lasting peace to her people."
plus the skins King Tryndamere and Queen Ashe and their titles "King and Queen of the Freljord" imply they are both leaders of the Freljord, so that's where the "married" rumor came from

No rumor at all. It was clearly stated in the Journal of Justice (which is no longer considered canon, so this could now be debatable) that Ashe and Trynda married each-other due to political reason.
 We don't have much clue if their relationship has changed in the new lore since then, perhaps or perhaps not. No lore seems to make notice of that right now.

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/The_Journal_of_Justice:_Volume_1,_Issue_05

Journal of Justice, Issue 5

Ashe married Tryndamere to unite their factions and get Freljord city-state status.
Some one give this man a cookie.

> [{quoted}](name=LordHippoman,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=o2vAiYWn,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-11-12T20:01:42.592+0000)
>
> http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/The_Journal_of_Justice:_Volume_1,_Issue_05
> 
> Journal of Justice, Issue 5
> 
> Ashe married Tryndamere to unite their factions and get Freljord city-state status.

You actually went out and got it. Props.
It comes from the old lore, where in order to get IoW recognition as a nation Ashe and Tryndamere got married politically to unite their peoples and call it the Freljord.

Holy shit...they might not actually be married anymore.

And {{champion:4}} might have never dated {{champion:28}}...Riot please don't do this.  Having Tobias meet up with an ex that dumped him seems too damn funny.

The JoJ listed it, but it's technically not canon anymore. However, that is detail that seems pretty simple to leave, as the Frejlord doesn't have basically anything to do with the rest of Runeterra or the LoL, the main sources of the retcon.

It's part of the old lore, but the core of the old lore got retconned. Now Riot is picking which parts of the old lore they want to keep in their new lore.

Might be that they keep this marriage, might not be.

> [{quoted}](name=Sneak Dog,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=o2vAiYWn,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-12T16:48:59.755+0000)
>
> It's part of the old lore, but the core of the old lore got retconned. Now Riot is picking which parts of the old lore they want to keep in their new lore.
> 
> Might be that they keep this marriage, might not be.

Actually Riot mentioned that they were still married in the new canon, but not due political reasons.
Source or GTFO I'm afraid. I don't believe it would be for romantic reasons, it just doesn't fit.

> [{quoted}](name=Orisi,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=o2vAiYWn,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-13T02:18:54.862+0000)
>
> Source or GTFO I'm afraid. I don't believe it would be for romantic reasons, it just doesn't fit.

It was said like a year ago (after the Shurima Event or the Freljord one) by Ironstylus if i remember coreclty, in this board... im not going to look for the source because it would take me hours. You can search it by yourself.

A person asked after the removal of the league and the lore change of Tryndamere, since he had no "tribe" anymore (Aatrox Killed them), a political marriage would make no sense... but he still the Barbarian King, the King of the Avarosans.

> [{quoted}](name=epicz753,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=o2vAiYWn,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-14T03:02:24.103+0000)
>
> source or GTFO

Well, y GTFO
Eh, just copying guy who asked for source :/

I've heard that Tryndamere's looks are based off of the creator of Riot, and Ashe is based off of his wife. 
I don't know if this is true, but I assume the champions are married based off of this.
Isn't the creator of Riot's in game name Tryndamere?
